target: Really? Who thought of the idea?
context: <user> I love the  Appalachian Trail - it's around  2,200 miles  and is beautiful! <system> I've never been but I wouldn't mind going one day! <user> What I love about it is that it goes through many states, including Georgia, North Carolina, Tennessee, Virginia, and lots more!  So much lovely scenery! <system> What kind of wildlife is there? <user> There's foxes and raccoons!  At least 2 million people hike on at least part of the trail every year! <system> Wow I bet its really good exercise. <user> It sure is!  Interestingly, it was in 1921 when the idea of creating the Appalachian Trail first came about <system>
